data.eml:eml: Study of the genus Gomphocerippus (Orthoptera, Acridoidea, Acrididae, Gomphocerinae) with a new species from northeast China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Jun-Jian, Ren, Bing-Zhong, Li, An (2016): Study of the genus Gomphocerippus (Orthoptera, Acridoidea, Acrididae, Gomphocerinae) with a new species from northeast China. Zootaxa 4072 (5): 585-588, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.5.6
